comments: Previous name was: A simple grammar.
links: INRIA Algorithms Project, Encyclopedia of Combinatorial Structures 842
formula: E.g.f.: -LambertW(x/(-1+x))a(n) = Sum_{k=1..n} (n!/k!)*binomial(n-1, k-1)*k^(k-1). - _Vladeta Jovovic_, Sep 17 2003a(n) ~ (1+exp(-1))^(n+1/2)*n^(n-1). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Sep 30 2013
prog: (Maxima) makelist(sum((n!/k!)*binomial(n-1, k-1)*k^(k-1), k, 1, n), n, 0, 17);   [Bruno Berselli, May 25 2011]
author: encyclopedia(AT)pommard.inria.fr, Jan 25 2000
extensions: New name using e.g.f., _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Sep 30 2013
